listing.listing_description: Spend an exceptional stay in London at Two Jermyn Street. Beautifully appointed and centrally located, this two-bedroom apartment is a haven of luxury in the heart of the city, close to museums, palaces, shopping and more. Reserve its spacious rooms for a holiday with family, a weekend away with another couple or a honeymoon-style escape with your sweetheart.After a day out in the city, pour a glass of wine and look out over the rooftops from the private balcony on the fifth floor, see what’s showing on the satellite TV or share photos via Wi-Fi. For your convenience, the villa also has an espresso machine and laundry facilities.Two Jermyn Street is laid out around an open-concept living and dining area, where an ornate fireplace lends traditional charm and metallic accents add contemporary glam. The neutral-toned sectional and dining table for six are comfortable and inviting, and the separate galley kitchen is fully equipped.Each of the two bedrooms at this vacation rental has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning; one of the bedrooms also opens to the balcony. For larger parties or families traveling with older children who might want their own accommodations, there’s also a double sofa bed in the living room.A stay at Two Jermyn Street puts you just minutes from the city’s top sights. Its St. James location is a 4-minute walk from Piccadilly Circus and less than a 10-minute drive from Trafalgar Square, Buckingham Palace, Harrods and Hyde Park. Listen to Big Ben chime the hours, marvel at the hush inside Westminster Abbey and shop for souvenirs or step out for dinner in the streets around the apartment. Or take it all in from a bird’s-eye viewpoint on a ride on the nearby London Eye.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape the city whenever you please at this chic apartment above the bustling streets of central London. Plan out a day of sightseeing while you sip your morning tea in the furnished terrace lounge. Then, grab a quick bite and look out over the city-view before you head downstairs. Once you’re on the streets, walk the Marylebone neighborhood to discover boutique shops, cafes, and historic pubs.Just like the streets below, The Water Lily sparks curiosity with its trendy, artistic atmosphere. Take a moment to inspect the artifacts in the glass display case beside the living room’s piano. Have the entertainer in your group play a few numbers while you check out the view through the antique telescope. On a quiet night in, curl up in the media room for a movie. Or, find peace and tranquility in the yoga studio.Throw on some comfortable shoes and walk to nearby neighborhoods, Soho, Oxford Circus, and Mayfair, where you’ll effortlessly stumble upon unique shops, brilliant bakeries, and bustling local pubs. The big attractions, like Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, and Covent Garden, are all under 3-miles in a taxi. Before dinner, do some shopping in Picadilly Circus, and take a quick stroll through some of the free art museums in the area. Then, see what stirs your appetite at Camden Market.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Dreams of Parisian romance become reality at Luxury Trocadero. Discover your own private hideaway in the City of Light at an intimate vacation rental in the 16th arrondissement that’s just the right size for a honeymoon or idyllic escape. Hotel amenities and a full staff are ready to pamper, and when you’re ready to explore, the Eiffel Tower and the rest of the city are just around the corner.Guests of Luxury Trocadero are welcome to use the shared pool, fitness center, steam room and library at the five-star La Réserve hotel; just use the in-villa iPad to call for the hotel’s limousine to whisk you from the apartment to La Réserve. Butler service, daily breakfast and afternoon tea are included in your stay, as are access to tennis courts and bicycles.Though the villa is set in a classic Haussmann building—an imposing, cut-stone, 19th-century edifice—its interiors are cool, contemporary and utterly chic. The open-plan living and dining room have the gracious dimensions, tall windows and wrought-iron balconies of historic Parisian apartments, while furnishings like tuxedo-style sofas, a low-profile coffee table and a lacquered dining table feel sleek and modern. The fully equipped kitchen continues in this vein, with flat-fronted blond-wood cabinets wrapping around state-of-the-art appliances.The single bedroom at Luxury Trocadero is perfect for a couple, though it could also accommodate two friends or family members on a French holiday. The bedroom is its own haven, with a four-poster queen bed and sitting area, but the en-suite bathroom raises the stakes in relaxation with a balneotherapy bathtub and rain shower.A location in the Passy-Trocadero area puts the city’s most iconic sights at your doorstep. Not only is the Eiffel Tower visible from the apartment’s balcony, it’s just a short walk away, as are the restaurants lining the Avenue d’Eylau and the greenery along Avenue Georges Mandel. Take a short taxi or subway ride (or a long walk) to the galleries of the Louvre, the awe-inspiring Notre-Dame Cathedral or the urban oasis of the Luxembourg Gardens.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steal away to an elegant hideaway overlooking Florence: Honeymoon Master Suite. From the private confines of this beautifully appointed vacation rental in charming Fiesole, you can look out to the Duomo and the rest of the city’s historic center—and you can reach them with a short drive. The one-bedroom suite makes an idyllic retreat for a couple or a wonderful base for exploring Tuscany.After a day of sightseeing, enjoy a glass of wine and a local cheese or two at the al-fresco dining area on the villa’s terrace. As the sun sets, unwind in front of the TV or catch up with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi. The fireplace may be decorative but heating is included, and there are laundry facilities for your convenience.From its meticulously restored architectural details to its thoughtfully selected furnishings, Honeymoon Master Suite makes a stunning impression. Colorful ceilings and an ornate fireplace surround distinguish the living room with the luxury of another age. The spaces are functional, too, though; the dining table seats four and the kitchen is fully equipped.The villa’s single bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, its own decorative fireplace and a TV. For your comfort, the bedroom is also air conditioned. Like the main living areas, it’s richly furnished yet welcoming, with paneled walls and a parquet floor lending ample traditional charm.While it may not be as famous as Florence, the town of Fiesole has its own historic bona fides, with villas, monasteries and piazzas dating from the Renaissance—if not before. Eventually, it became an exclusive residential area for wealthy Florentines, and today, it’s your own holiday enclave just minutes from the sights of the city by car or bus. If you’re keen on driving, you can also take a day trip to the famed hill town of San Gimignano.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set between two beautiful avenues lined with majestic trees, La Réserve de Paris stands out in this iconic city with its domed slate roof. Enjoy that certain je ne sais quoi about returning home each day to this timeless area of the world. This Parisian Hideaway faces the Place du Trocadero with the many terraces of its old-time brasseries. Experience the romance of the City of Light in an authentic vacation rental with Luxury Retreats!This chic and intimate accommodation is located in a splendid Haussmann-style, cut-stone building. In the ideal setting for a discreet, private getaway to stylish Trocadero, even the housekeeper will be virtually invisible while serving each morning’s personalized breakfast. Guests of Mon Eiffel will receive complimentary access to all the hotel services of La Réserve de Paris, a five-star hotel and spa that will make daily life even more magical. Facilities include a swimming pool, fitness center, steam room and library.This beautiful and spacious apartment features well-delineated day and night areas, which means that children can sleep peacefully while parents are hosting friends in the vast formal dining room. The remarkably sized windows ensure the living room is flooded with light that illuminates the modern works of art. With stunning classic architecture, the contemporary interior design creates a magnificent contrast that embodies the new Parisian chic.Two bedrooms accommodate up to four guests at this non-smoking apartment. Both bedrooms provide queen size beds, en-suite bathrooms and televisions. One of the suites also has a rain shower and a balneotherapy tub. Fine linens and accoutrements provide splendid nights of rest amid the hushed frequencies of the city. We recommend Mon Eiffel for a family getaway, a couples’ retreat or a decadent honeymoon in this unrivaled cultural destination.Guests of Mon Eiffel will enjoy the services of a full, professional staff. Daily housekeeping, butler service, daily breakfasts, a welcome package, daily afternoon tea times, laundry service and valet service are all included with your holiday reservation. Sportive guests will also love use of the bicycles and complimentary access to the Roland Garros Tennis Courts, home of the French Open. Paris never looked so good!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy access to one of the most exclusive amenities in London at One Jermyn Street. Not only is this luxury apartment beautifully furnished and centrally located in the St. James area, it opens to its own private outdoor spaces overlooking the city. Its two bedrooms make it a perfect choice for a family with children, two couples or a honeymoon-style break in a prime neighborhood.After a day out shopping or sightseeing, pour a glass of wine and unwind on the terrace, then sit down to dinner at the al-fresco table. On cool or rainy evenings—this is London, after all—turn on the heat inside and settle down by the satellite TV or Wi-Fi. For your convenience, the villa also has an espresso machine and laundry facilities.This spacious vacation rental is laid out around an open-concept living and dining room with an ornate fireplace, mid-century-inspired furnishings and chic metallic accents. The separate kitchen is bright, sleek and fully equipped.One Jermyn Street has one master bedroom with a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. The second bedroom has a queen bed and shared access to a hall bathroom. For larger parties or those traveling with older children who want their own space, there is a double sofa bed in the living room.Of course, you’ll want to spend your holiday seeing the city—and the apartment’s location makes it a snap. It’s a 4-minute walk from One Jermyn Street to Piccadilly Circus and less than a 10-minute drive to iconic sights such as Trafalgar Square, Buckingham Palace and Hyde Park. Listen to Big Ben chime the hours, let yourself be tempted by the displays at Harrods, take a ride on the London Eye or simply try out the restaurants and pubs in the neighborhood.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Jade is a gorgeous luxury home on the northeast coast of Mallorca. Situated within Cap Vermell Estate, an exclusive community of twelve villas with a private country club, the home is nestled on 1,700 square meters of private grounds with sweeping views of Canyamel Valley. The beautifully constructed villa blends the rustic elegance of the Balearic Islands with superb modern comforts, including a voluminous saltwater swimming pool with retractable cover. Three lovely bedroom suites accommodate six travelers, making it an ideal choice for families and destination wedding guests. The vacation rental includes discounted access to Cap Vermell Country Club and other communal amenities, and Camanyel Beach is just a few minutes away.Cloistered amid high hedges, the villa's ample estate inspires long days and evenings under the Mediterranean sky. The pool is perched along the side of the house, accompanied by lounge chairs, a lush lawn, and a cool veranda. An exterior staircase leads to the upper balcony, featuring an alfresco dining table and open-air lounge with breathtaking views.The main interior living area is on the upper level, with lovely French doors opening to the balcony. This open-concept space includes a lounge area and dining table four six beneath peaked, exposed-wood ceilings. Just off the dining area, the gourmet kitchen features high-end appliances and walnut cabinets. The home's gorgeous décor includes museum-worthy artwork and design pieces set against luminous white surfaces that glow with abundant daylight and sunset tones. The villa also includes an office for your convenience, as well as air conditioning and underfloor heating.The bedrooms are on the ground level, opening to the pool terrace. Each features a double bed and ensuite bathroom, providing comfortable havens for afternoon siestas and peaceful nights. Two of these ensuite bathrooms have tubs, one with spa-style jets. Additional bedding is available upon request.Villa Jade balances serene privacy with resort-style convenience, just minutes from the renowned Canyamel Golf Course and Canyamel Beach. Cap Vermell Country Club offers guests a wide array of sport and wellness amenities, as well as delicious, health-conscious cuisine.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A decidedly bold and stylish residence, this roomy apartment in centrally-located Marylebone delivers with both flair and convenience. An impressive color scheme of black and white gives the home character and a modern feel. Use of mirrored walls and rich stone adds doses of class, amidst rich sofas, comfortable bedrooms and a chic dining area. Central London plus local dining is on your doorstep.Guests can expect a stimulating environment, with luxury features and proximity to attractions with Marylebone Escape. The compact but efficient kitchen suits a small but active group of guests, while the coffee table area is ideal for relaxing over breakfast and planning an active day around this great capital city. This home has everything a visiting group could need, from the essentials like the in-house washing machine, to the nice extras, including the wine storage cellar.Marylebone is the kind of neighborhood that will perfectly match those looking to get a lot of their time in London. With pleasant woodland parks nearby, including Regent’s Park, guests can take frequent public transport links, including the tube, to access the shopping cornucopia of Piccadilly Circus and magnificent landmarks like St Paul’s Cathedral and towering Big Ben. The rich history of the local area will be of great interest to literary and culinary-minded guests, with a huge number of restaurants, pubs and museums.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.For guests travelling in the warmer months, please note that air conditioning is not available at this property.

listing.listing_description: Engulfed by world-famous history, this regal, contemporary apartment is located on the second piano nobile of this Venice-based pallazzo. Take a short, scenic walk to the Rialto Bridge (the oldest bridge spanning the Grand Canal) and discover a new favourite gelato or espresso spot. Towering dove-grey ceilings are framed by bronze stucco moulding and elongated windows overlooking the floating city. Italian-inspired furniture, including plump couches and a contemporary glass dining table, detail the interior. A long threaded carpet leads the way to dusty pink and black flecked antique terrazzo flooring that flows throughout. Stainless steel, glass, and oxidised brass details are visually softened by traditional embroidery and a harmonious palette of hushed hues. Wake up to the sounds of the rippling canal and its many boats gliding through. The shared garden and alfresco kitchen area is a serene spot to sip a glass of wine. Admire works of art at Scuola Grande di San Rocco, or visit the iconic St Mark's Basilica on an afternoon of exploring the city. Northern Italy’s Lido di Venezia, an 11-kilometer sandbar where the Venice Film Festival takes place, is nearby. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set on a hilltop outside the spa town of San Casciano dei Bagni, Villa Serena offers a quiet retreat in the heart of Tuscany’s Val d’Orcia region. The two-story, six-bedroom stucco villa is surrounded by over 50 acres of private woodland, guaranteeing privacy and peace. Stroll the formal gardens, relax by the pool or spend the day at the Roman spas in town, just minutes away.Start the day with a coffee at the seating area on the covered patio overlooking the swimming pool, taking in the views and smelling the rose, jasmine and lavender in the garden. The patio also includes a table and chairs for al fresco dining. In spite of its rural location, the villa is well-connected, with satellite TV/ SMART TV, telephone and Wi-Fi access.Inside, traditional style furnishings in modern, neutral tones have comfortable, casual appeal. In the living room, green gray sofas and armchairs offer plenty of seating and are set off by red and white throw pillows and a Persian-style rug. The rustic chic vibe continues in the dining room and eat in kitchen, which is fully equipped and opens to the garden to let the breeze waft in.Each of Villa Serena's six bedrooms is air-conditioned (in the main house). The master suite has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and access to a patio. Two more bedrooms, one with a king bed and one with a queen, each have an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and access to a terrace. There’s one bedroom with two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and a shared bathroom. Additional accommodations are available in a room with two twin beds, an en-suite bathroom and separate entrance (No Air Conditioning).The shopping, restaurants and thermal spas of San Casciano dei Bagni are just a 5-minute drive from Villa Serena. It’s worth exploring the Val d’Orcia area, too, to sample local specialties like wine, game and cheese and take in the landscape. If you’d like to take a day trip, Cetona is a 30-minute drive away, Pienza, Montepulciano & Montalcino only 1 hour drive away, Siena is a 90-minute drive away, Florence is a 105-minute drive away and Rome is about 2 hours by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: While other parts of Tuscany have developed industries that have done much for the economy but little for the landscape, the "Crete Senesi" area and the neighboring "Val d'Orcia" have largely remained true to their early agricultural vocation. Today this means local products of outstanding quality, made with traditional methods and skills that are handed down from generation to generation. The best-known of these are Montalcino's distinguished Brunello red wine and the Vino Nobile of Montepulciano, both of which are the perfect complement to dishes based on the wild game of the area: pheasant, quail, hare, and wild boar. Likewise, the Pecorino cheeses made with ewe's milk from the Pienza pastures are now in great demand. One of the best food stores in the Pienza area is La Cornucopia (2 Piazza Martiri della Liberta) where you can find sweets, honey and cheeses.

While visiting the famous wine producing town of Montalcino and the artistic jewel of Pienza, you will be fascinated by their charm and history. Montalcino has a wealth of superb paintings and sculptures that make its beautifully renovated museum such a remarkable attraction. Pienza's beauty was used as a backdrop to Franco Zeffirelli's masterpiece: "Romeo and Juliet."

listing.listing_address: San Casciano dei Bagni, Toscana, Italy

listing.listing_description: Chalet Maurice is a stunning luxury villa at Zermatt in the Swiss Alps, situated just ten minutes on foot from town and the world-famous ski slopes. The villa offers an extraordinary balance of privacy and resort-like amenities, including spa facilities, an outdoor hot tub, and ample lounge and dining areas, while its ideal position enjoys breathtaking views of the Matterhorn. Six king/twin bedrooms easily accommodate twelve guests, and additional accommodations can be arranged upon request. The villa is air-conditioned, child-friendly, and wheelchair accessible, and its complimentary perks include chef services and kids’ meals six days a week, a villa manager, and a superb selection of drinks for après-ski festivities.The villa balances the naturalistic charm of an archetypal Swiss chalet with tastefully curated modern artwork and high-end contemporary comforts. Its superb wellness amenities include an in-villa massage room, steamroom, and outdoor whirlpool spa, allowing you to soothe your tested muscles after a day on the mountain, and savor a warm soak under the stars sky.The villa's central living area is luminous and cozy, with peaked ceilings of exposed wood and ample windows that flood the home with inspiring light and vistas. The lounge and dining room open to the spacious deck, creating an ample venue for evening delights. Kindle the barbeque and relish your dinner alfresco during the warmer months, or gather indoors for a delectable and well-earned feast.The bedrooms are distributed over three floors, and each bed can be King or Twin, Television, deluxe ensuite bathroom with tub or shower. Five of the rooms enjoy spectacular views of the Matterhorn. The superb master suite includes a a large sofa facing a wood-burning fireplace.The chalet is conveniently located within the pedestrian-only Zermatt, just minutes on foot from tennis courts, excellent restaurants and bars, a variety of stores, and some of the finest skiing, hiking, and mountaineering in the world.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tenuta Pomona is located on the southern hillside of the ancient Etruscan town, Cortona. This recently renovated stone villa and cottage have been updated to meet the highest standard of luxury travel. Tenuta Pomona’s designers focused on maintaining the villa’s architectural authenticity, using materials of great value that honor the morphology of Tuscany’s unique landscape. With four luxurious bedrooms, spacious interiors, and large, secluded property, this villa is perfect for a family getaway, high-end corporate retreat, or special occasion.Positioned a comfortable distance from the lights and sounds of Cortona, Tenuta Pomona’s beautiful estate is decorated with lush lawns, vibrant gardens, and iconic olive trees. Both the Main House and Guest House are made from ancient stone, with exposed wood beams and tiled floors to complete the authentic Tuscan atmosphere. The villa’s interior decor is stately and elegant, with contemporary designer furnishings, warm wood accents, and shuttered-windows to capture views of the countryside. The fully equipped kitchen has its foot furthest into the future, with state of the art appliances and updated granite countertops. You’ll also appreciate satellite television, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and the grand fireplace in the living room.If you’re planning a special occasion or just casual family dinners, Tenuta Pomona has formal dining inside with seating for eight, alfresco dining for ten, and several smaller lounge areas that are perfect for morning coffees. During your stay, you’ll enjoy daily housekeeping, daily breakfast, and welcome dinner with a private chef.Another perk included with your reservation is a walking tour of Cortana, which is a great way to get acquainted with the area and all of its history, as well as its boutique shops, bakeries, markets, and nightlife establishments. If you’re up for a day trip, the bustling city of Siena is less than an hour from home, or, you could do the opposite and head to Trasimeno Regional Park and immerse yourself in the beautiful natural environment of Italy.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. listing.listing_description: Located on a beautifully scenic countryside property in Central Algarve, this spacious Portuguese vacation rental is perfect for a family reunion, high-end corporate retreat, or destination wedding. With six ensuite bedrooms, lavish interiors, and a back terrace decorated with lush lawns and vibrant greenery, you’ll have no trouble setting the mood for an unforgettable event or vacation. Nearby, you’ll be able to visit the sandy shores of Faro Beach, explore natural and historical wonders, experience authentic Portuguese cuisine at the many restaurants in Estoi and its neighboring towns.Vila Vale Mouro’s elegant white-washed exterior provides the perfect contrast to the vibrant blues and greens of Algarve. Decorated with arched doorways, lavish water features, a swimming pool, and intricate stonework, Vale Mouro’s scenic terrace is sure to melt all your stresses away. Inside, the open concept lounge contains the formal dining area and living room. The focal point of the room is an imposing stone fireplace with a widescreen television above. Just beyond, a wide, arched doorway to the fully equipped kitchen makes sure the social flow and atmosphere of Vila Vale Mouro aren’t interrupted, even when preparing meals. And upstairs, each en-suite bedroom possesses its own unique character, thanks to their exciting accent walls.During your stay, you’re sure to appreciate the villa’s entertaining features, like cable television, Wi-Fi, an integrated sound system, and a game room with a ping pong table and video game console. At dinner, Vale Mouro has formal dining inside for twelve and space for fourteen at the alfresco set on the terrace. For something more casual, fire up the wood oven and try your luck at making pizza.When it’s time to get out and explore Algarve, Estoi is the perfect place to start. Spend an afternoon wandering the winding cobblestone streets and village square, which is just a short walk from Palacio do Visconde de Estoi, an eighteenth-century palace considered to be one of the finest buildings in Algarve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular villa is situated in the Greve in Chianti area of Tuscany, a short walk from the village of Panzano. Part of the Villa Le Marcelina hamlet (comprising three secluded homes), the villa enjoys its own expansive estate with a lovely alfresco dining terrace and private infinity swimming pool. The superbly remodeled house maintains much of the antique charm of its sixteenth-century origins, with beautiful stone facades and a colombaia (turret) with 360-degree views of the countryside. Contemporary amenities and décor include a gourmet kitchen, indoor plunge pool, and superb contemporary artwork with women-centered themes (hence the “Donne” of the villa’s name). Seven queen bedrooms with ensuite or private bathrooms (including a stunning master suite with in-room jetted tub) accommodate up to fourteen guests.Nestled amid flowering gardens and surrounded by some of the region's finest vineyards, the estate offers an exceptional venue for special occasions or serene escapes. The upper plateau features an eight-by-eight-meter swimming pool and plentiful sun loungers, with spectacular views of the valley and hills. On the lower level, an outdoor kitchen and canopied dining area inspire memorable meals in the cypress-scented air.The owners’ artful remodeling project has breathed a contemporary spirit into the vintage Tuscan home. The main salon features a wood-burning hearth and sloping ceilings of rustic wood and brick. Gorgeous archways lead into a second sitting area and a luminous breakfast room. The main dining room with farmhouse table is perfect for nighttime feasts with family and friends. Gourmet travelers will adore the fully equipped kitchen, which includes a seven-burner cooker, double oven, and French doors to the patio. Upstairs, the spa-style plunge pool gazes out on the landscape through a picture window.All seven suites feature queen beds and ensuite or private bathrooms. In the master suite, an elevated jetted tub is perched beside a high-end TV. There is a second jetted tub in one of the guest bathrooms. Air conditioning throughout the villa ensures comfort in all seasons.Ville Delle Donna is about twenty miles from both Florence and Siena, and a short car trip from several fabulous villages, including Monteriggioni, San Gimignano, and Castellina. Golfers are an easy drive from Ugolino Golf Club and Dante Alighieri Golf e Country Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set between two beautiful avenues lined with majestic trees, La Réserve de Paris stands out in this iconic city with its domed slate roof. Enjoy that certain je ne sais quoi about returning home each day to this timeless area of the world. Eiffel Hideaway faces the Place du Trocadero with the many terraces of its old-time brasseries. Experience the romance of the City of Light with exceptional views of the Eiffel Tower in an authentic vacation rental with Luxury Retreats!This chic and intimate accommodation is located in a splendid Haussmann-style, cut-stone building. In the ideal setting for a discreet, private getaway to stylish Trocadero, even the housekeeper will be virtually invisible while serving each morning’s personalized breakfast. Guests of Eiffel Hideaway will receive complimentary access to all the hotel services of La Réserve de Paris, a five-star hotel and spa that will make daily life even more magical. Facilities include a swimming pool, fitness center, steam room and library.This beautiful and spacious apartment features well-delineated day and night areas, which means that children can sleep peacefully while parents are hosting friends in the vast formal dining room. The remarkably sized windows ensure the living room is flooded with light that illuminates the modern works of art. With stunning classic architecture, the contemporary interior design creates a magnificent contrast that embodies the new Parisian chic.Three bedrooms accommodate up to six guests at this non-smoking apartment. All bedrooms provide queen size beds, en-suite bathrooms and televisions. One of the suites also has a rain shower and a balneotherapy tub. Fine linens and accoutrements provide splendid nights of rest amid the hushed frequencies of the city. We recommend Eiffel Hideaway for a family getaway, a couples’ retreat or a decadent honeymoon in this unrivaled cultural destination.Guests of Eiffel Hideaway will enjoy the services of a full, professional staff. Daily housekeeping, butler service, daily breakfasts, a welcome package, daily afternoon tea times, laundry service and limousine service are all included with your holiday reservation. Sportive guests will also love use of the bicycles and complimentary access to the Roland Garros Tennis Courts, home of the French Open. Paris never looked so good!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Set on a hilltop in the countryside just south of Siena, Villa Ferraia offers luxury accommodations for groups of up to 27 people. There’s something for everyone to do, from cooking lessons and stargazing to gardening and spa experiences in the pools and sauna. A library, nearby trails and fourteen bedrooms arranged in three areas create a peaceful, private retreat in an idyllic setting.The villa has plenty to offer both adventurous travelers and guests who’d prefer to relax. Take a walk through the woods just outside, arrange a cooking lesson or join a stargazing session with a local astronomy society. Ask the gardener about helping in the vegetable garden, then grill the produce on the barbecue. If you’d rather relax while on holiday, this expansive vacation rental has a library, home theater and plenty of seating on the covered terrace with glorious views over the hills of Tuscany. An outdoor pool, three plunge pools and a Finnish-style sauna create your very own mini-spa area.Inside, Villa Ferraia is warm and eclectic, with white slipcovered sofas gathered around brightly painted fireplaces, traditionally inspired wooden tables and rustic brick archways. There are plenty of tucked-away seating areas for a quiet moment spent reading or napping, but the formal dining room can seat all 27 friends or family members at once. The villa has a fully equipped kitchen, and continental breakfast is included in your stay. On-request meals can be provided at extra cost if you’d like something special to celebrate a birthday, anniversary or just being together.The villa’s fourteen bedrooms are divided into three areas: the main house, a guest house and a guest suite. The main house has ten bedrooms, most with en-suite bathrooms, that share two common living rooms. The guest house has its own entrance and three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms that share a living room and kitchenette. The guest suite also has its own entrance from the courtyard, and with its en-suite bathroom, living and dining areas, it could double as a honeymoon or in-law suite.It’s well worth taking time to explore the area around Villa Ferraia. The estate is a 15-minute drive from the charming town of Monticiano, which has restaurants, shops and a tennis court. In the winter, head for the ski slopes of Monte Amiata, an hour’s drive away, or for an indulgent soak in the hot springs at Terme di Petriolo. If you’re visiting during the summer, plan to play a round or two at the Bagnaia or Punta Ala golf courses, or spend a languid afternoon on the Castiglione della Pescaia beach, a 97 km drive from the property. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 143 km drive to Pisa or a 40-minute private flight to Rome from the nearby airport of Ampugnano.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Unique architecture gives this exceptional property a character all of its own. Built around a cluster of 11 restored trulli, the quirky conical dwellings characteristic of this part of Italy, it makes the perfect base for a wonderfully relaxing holiday. For those looking for Puglia villa rentals that display local character and culture, the Baraquiel Villa is an absolute gem.Luxury and relaxation are the recurring themes. Spend long, lazy days around the stunning swimming pool and adjacent gazebo, fully equipped for idyllic al fresco dining and leisurely socializing, or retreat to one of the two stone courtyards – outdoor living areas – for some quality reading time. Surrounded by olive groves, the jasmine-scented gardens are a haven of peace and quiet.The elegant air-conditioned interior combines traditional architectural features with high-end modern furnishings and thoughtful attention to detail. A wonderful sense of light and space pervades the living areas with their brickwork vaulted ceilings. Two kitchens are fully equipped to cater for large groups – ideal for two families renting together or guests traveling with domestic staff.Designed to make the most of the unusual structure, three of the luxurious bedrooms feature queen-sized beds (a fourth bedroom has two single beds) complete with top-quality linen. The three well-appointed bathrooms are attractively tiled, and bathrobes and slippers are provided.The surrounding region holds a huge amount of interest. Explore Ostuni, a picture-book medieval town with dazzling whitewashed buildings and some sublime restaurants serving up Puglian cuisine and fresh seafood. The beautiful baroque city of Lecce is close by, while for sea lovers, both the Adriatic and Ionian coasts are close at hand.Read more about Baraquiel Relais in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2015/05/step-back-in-time-at-baraquiel-relais-in-puglia/)Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy blissful days and restful nights at the aptly named Villa Sweet Dreams. This stunning vacation rental on the Split Riviera boasts a gorgeous waterfront location, lush gardens and contemporary architecture. Its views over the water and surrounding forest will have you dreaming of your holiday long after it’s over.Drive up to the villa or pull in to the private dock, then commence relaxing in outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, hot tub, sound system, sauna and plenty of loungers. As the sun sets, heat up the barbecue and fetch a bottle from the wine cave for dinner at the al-fresco table, or gather inside around the TV, fireplace or Wi-Fi.The sleek, contemporary lines of Villa Sweet Dreams are softened by a generous use of creamy local stone. Wall-to-wall sliding glass doors lead from the terrace to the open-concept great room, which is flooded with light and simply yet stylishly furnished. It includes two sitting areas, a dining table for eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.The four bedrooms at this luxury property can accommodate up to nine friends or family members. There is one bedroom with a king bed, one bedroom with a queen bed and one bedroom with a double bed, all of which have en-suite bathrooms, as well as a bedroom with two twin beds and shared access to a hall bathroom. A separate playroom also has a twin bed that can be used as additional accommodations.Villa Sweet Dreams is on the quieter side of the island of Brač, just a short drive from the small port town of Sumartin and its popular beach, perfect for a swim in the clear waters or a honeymoon-style stroll along the pebbled strand. Of course, if you’d like to see the livelier side, it’s easy to take a day trip to the towns of Bol and Supetar.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated amongst olive trees in the rollings hills between Florence and Siena, Villa Le Scuderie is the perfect getaway on the Chianti countryside. Located in Greve, this newly renovated farmhouse offers incredible views of olive groves and vineyards that stretch as far as the eye can see. From Greve, you’ll be able to plan day trips to some of Italy’s most exciting art cities, ancient hamlets, and an endless list of local vineyards, restaurants, and natural wonders. With four queen en-suites and a beautifully spacious estate, Villa Le Scuderie is perfect for a family getaway, vacation with friends, or a high-end corporate retreat.Merging the Old-World with the new, Villa Le Scuderie shows off its ancient authenticity on the exterior with original stone walls and tiled roof, while inside, you’ll surely appreciate the updated, contemporary atmosphere, decorated with high-end electronics and designer furnishings. This villa’s unique floor plan is a testament to the owner's desire not to disturb the original structure. Architectural ingenuity has an indoor swimming pool overlooking the kitchen and dining area, proving that, sometimes, you can have it all. The kitchen, dining room, and lounge area flow seamlessly out to the terrace, where you’ll find even more dining space and amazing views of the Chianti countryside.At Villa Le Scuderie, the indoor swimming pool isn’t the only place to relax and enjoy the view; there’s also a hot tub on the terrace. Back inside, you’ll appreciate television, air conditioning, and a fireplace, as well as daily housekeeping and continental breakfasts for the duration of your stay.In less than an hour’s drive, you’ll find Michelangelo’s “David,” Botticelli’s “The Birth of Venus,” and da Vinci’s “Annunciation” in the many galleries and museums of Florence. Head in the opposite direction, and you can visit Siena’s Piazza Del Campo, Torre Del Mangia, and the Siena Cathedral. If you’d like to stick a little closer to home, you’ll find incredible pizza at Piazza Matteotti and classic Chanti cuisine at Osteria Al Ponte, both in Greve. And, Discover Tuscany offers several options for guided wine tours, many of which come with private drivers.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Gaze upon panoramic seaside views, and breath in the crisp ocean air at this stylish Athenian villa. Find the perfect spot to watch the sunset on the pool deck, multi-level balconies, or through floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room. For a closer look, drive 4-km to Palea Fokea Beach. After a swim, grab a spot for dinner at one of the local taverns lining the sand.No matter which bedroom you’ve chosen, you’ll wake up to a view of Saronic Bay. Swing open the patio doors to enjoy the fresh sea breeze and linger in bed just a few extra minutes. Then, make your way downstairs, prepare breakfast, and relax amongst the minimalistic decor and designer furnishings. When the evening nears, don’t be afraid to invite new friends over, there’s parking for 7 at this gated-property. And, both the formal and alfresco settings offer scenic vistas. After you’ve eaten, move the party to the row of lounge chairs on the terrace and watch over Anavissos while you sip cocktails. If you’re in the mood for a late-night snack, fire up the barbecue or whip something up in the outdoor kitchen. If you’d rather hit the town, Athens is about 40-km from home. The Exarchia neighborhood is perfect for bar hopping and dinner, with lots of local favorites lining their winding streets. If you’re in the mood to dance, the Gyzi area is where you’ll find some of the world’s hottest nightclubs. And, make sure to explore the Acropolis Museum while you’re in town. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exquisite one-bedroom apartment is situated within a gorgeous, restored Victorian building on Hereford Road, in the heart of Notting Hill—a prime location for exploring the world-class dining, shops, and cultural life of West London. Ideal for a couple or individual traveler, the modern residence features a queen bedroom, a compact but well-equipped kitchen, and a stunning reception room suited to small gatherings, dinner parties, or relaxing downtime between forays on the town.Floor-to ceiling, west-facing windows overlook the street, infusing the reception room with natural light and vintage London views. Beautiful curtains provide privacy when needed, while elegant lamps and sconces and a crystal chandelier illuminate your evenings. A comfortable sofa faces a large, mounted TV, ideal for cozy moments over tea or spirits, while the dining table seats four on lovely tufted chairs. Fine herringbone wood floors, a plush carpet, and beautiful original artwork add subtle stylish touches to the home's understated elegance. The contemporary kitchen features high-end appliances, recessed lighting, and garden views.The bedroom is furnished with elegant minimalism, offering a serene haven for quiet afternoons and restful nights. A queen bed and mounted TV are set within soft white walls illuminated by a garden-view window. The bathroom boasts fine marble surfaces and a combined shower/tub.Hereford Road offers an ideal location for experiencing the myriad riches of this contemporary global capital. Perched on the border of Notting Hill and Bayswater, you're an easy walk to Notting Hill Gate, Kensington, Portobello Market, and the northwest corner of Hyde Park. Several convenient Tube stations are nearby, or you can drive a few miles to such iconic attractions as Buckingham Palace, the V&A Museum, and Big Ben. Heathrow is less than fourteen miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: If you appreciate fine dining, fine art, and fine wine, love historic architecture and wish to lead an undemanding, yet elegant lifestyle, there is no better place for you to be than Italy’s Puglia region. The vineyards, olive groves, and ancient towns are rich with old-world authenticity, as is Villa Petrose, your next Luxury Retreats vacation home. With an abundance of indoor/outdoor space and accommodations for thirteen, Petrose is perfect for a family getaway or a special event like a romantic destination wedding.Merging classic Mediterranean architecture with a modern-contemporary philosophy led to Villa Petrose restructuring. Once a typical rural eighteenth-century building, this property has been carefully restored and outfitted using local materials and techniques. The interior features lots of floor-to-ceiling glass openings and white exposed wood ceiling beams, ensuring the flow of fresh country-side breeze and bright, natural sunlight. Designer furniture, neutral colors, and raw natural accent pieces are the highlights of the interior decor. The kitchen is fully equipped with state of the art appliances and plenty of functional counter space.Villa Petrose does an outstanding job of combining its relaxing, old-world elements with its modern high-tech gadgets. Television, a house laptop, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and an exercise room are all ready to use when you’re not enjoying the swimming pool, jetted tub, lounge chairs and hammocks outside. The bedrooms at Petrose are divided between the main house, with three queen-en-suites, and the guest house with two queen/single bedrooms, both with en-suites as well.Within six kilometers of Petrose, you’ll be able to find shops, banks, restaurants, and markets. There’s tennis, horseback riding, and diving classes on Campo Marino’s sandy beachfront. There are also several vineyards in the area that offer wine tasting and tours. Drive a little further, and you could spend an afternoon visiting the “Florence of the South” Lecce. There, you’ll find amazing historical sites like the Cattedrale di Lecce, Basilica di Santa Croce, and the Roman Amphitheatre.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Be charmed by the Tuscany of yore—even as you revel in modern comforts—at Il Fienile Di Montesoli. Though the name of this vacation rental translates roughly to “the barn at Montesoli,” it’s been lovingly renovated into a luxury getaway in the countryside near Siena. Reserve its four bedrooms for an Italian escape with friends and family, or for a honeymoon that’s truly away from it all.Il Fienile sits on manicured grounds with beautiful views of the surrounding hills. Watch the sun move across the landscape from a lounger on the terrace by the pool, relax in the outdoor sauna, play a game on the bocce court or see what’s growing in the vegetable garden. After sunset, heat up the barbecue for dinner at the al-fresco table or have a glass of local wine inside by the TV and Wi-Fi.Traditionally charming on the outside, the villa is classically elegant on the inside. High ceilings, wood floors and arched doorways distinguish the two refined sitting areas, which feature rich tones of red and cream. The color scheme continues in the open-plan dining room and fully equipped eat-in kitchen.The villa has three bedrooms with California king beds and one bedroom with a king bed. All four have private en-suite bathrooms, and can accommodate groups of up to eight on holiday together. Details like graceful accent chairs and architectural drawings as artwork make the bedrooms feel like stylish retreats.Use your stay at Il Fienile Di Montesoli to explore the countryside, stopping in at wineries and cafes or strolling through small towns. It’s an easy drive to the Borgo la Bagnaia golf course if you’d like to play a round, and just a bit farther to Siena, where you could easily spend several days delving into the city’s UNESCO-designated historic center.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let a country road lead you to the rural Villa dei Giardini. Set amongst three acres of cypress, olive and fruit trees, this four-bedroom semi-attached property offers both beautiful views and comfortable terraces from which to enjoy them. Although it’s secluded, it’s not isolated; the sights and amenities of Florence are only 30 minutes away.Take in the rolling Tuscan hills from one of the home’s three terraces: one with a sitting area and panoramic views; one with sitting and dining areas, a wood burning barbecue and marble work surface with sink; and one by the pool, with a sitting area and covered dining spot. There’s also an outdoor shower for post-swim rinses. Inside, the villa has modern conveniences like central air conditioning, a computer and Wi-Fi access.Villa dei Giardini’s interiors are airy and comfortable, with high, beamed ceilings and large windows. Traditional fireplace surrounds and terracotta floors have rustic charm, while neutral rugs and upholstery create a calm, relaxing atmosphere in the living room. The dining room features the same garden views and a large inlaid-wood table, and the bright, open-shelved kitchen has a dishwasher, tabletop grill and cheery tile backsplash.The villa’s four bedrooms each come with air conditioning, a hairdryer and Chianti Cashmere toiletries. Two bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms: one with a king bed and the other with a twin bed and pull-out bed. A third bedroom has a queen bed and private bathroom, and the fourth bedroom has a twin bed and private bathroom. A baby crib is also available.Villa dei Giardini is just five minutes from a grocery store, pizzeria and train station in town, and 13 km from the hospital and clinic in Fiesole. Bring your rackets for a game at the Anchetta tennis court, 7.6 km away, your workout clothes to the Four Seasons gym, 18.3 km away, or your clubs for a round at the Ugolino golf course, 22 km away. Get your fix of city life in Florence, about 18.3 km away, or take in the sun on the Forte dei Marmi beach, 131 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Read more about Villa Dei Giardini in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/09/home-tuscany/)

listing.listing_description: Surround yourself with inspiring views of the Amalfi Coast and World-famous beaches at this clifftop home in Capri. Sip Italian wine at the alfresco dining set as the sun sets over the bay below. For dinner, craft the perfect pie in the pizza oven on the terrace or grill up something fresh from a local market on the barbecue. After, walk 10 minutes down to the village of Capri for lively nightlife.Combining a few simple, high-quality ingredients is often the best way to create a delicious meal, and the same rings true with Hibiscus Capri’s decor. Elegant white meets warm wood tones, all atop intricate marble floors. With fragrant gardens, a wood-burning fireplace, and moonlit ocean-views, romance is always in the air. After making dinner together in the cozy kitchen, dine outside next to the Tyrrhenian Sea.Like most homes on the Capri coast, Hibiscus is only accessible by foot, so privacy is not an issue at this gated property. Stretch out in a sun lounger on the terrace and work on that vacation tan. Enjoy your morning Nespresso in the shade while you catch up on some reading, glancing away now and then to check out the sailboats in the bay below.Start your day with a stroll along the shore of Spiaggia di Marina Piccola, 8 minutes away. After, visit the cafes and bakeries of Capri for a late breakfast. Then, walk across Via Camerelle for high-end shopping in some of the World’s most prestigious fashion houses. At dinner, you’ll find an abundance of fresh seafood and traditional Italian cuisine in town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Glimpse the sun’s first rays on the Parthenon from this superb home in Athens’ historic Plaka neighborhood. Perched to the north of the Acropolis, the 700-square-meter residence offers a unique contemporary sanctuary in one of Europe’s oldest settlements, with spa-style amenities and spacious living areas furnished in a mid-century modern style. Explore Plaka’s vibrant nightlife on foot or drive minutes to the city’s finest museums and archeological sites.The villa’s main living area features an open-concept layout with glass walls leading out to the central terrace. Luminous white walls glow with abundant daylight and gorgeous evening tones, accentuating the sparkling blue pool and lush green ivy climbing the exterior wall. The sleek modern kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, serving a breakfast bar and table for 8.The living room offers a cozier ambiance, with a sectional sofa and tufted armchairs nestled amid beautiful artwork and a wood-burning fireplace. Downstairs, the library/media room features a projector and pull-down screen for late-night movies. The sauna and Hammam will warm you up before a soothing morning plunge.The hillside Plaka neighborhood is a favorite among native Athenians and global travelers alike, with a unique, village-like character. Stone-paved streets are lined with boutique stores, family-run tavernas and cafes, and family-friendly destinations including the Hellenic Children’s Museum and the Museum of Greek Folk Musical Instruments. Explore the ancient Roman Agora, behold the splendors of Byzantine temples, and wander through the extraordinary Anafiotika settlement nearby.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Chalet Dalmore is an exquisite contemporary chalet in Chamonix. Situated just one kilometer from La Flegere cable car at Mont Blanc Ski Resort, the villa features spectacular, panoramic views of iconic Mont Blanc from a private setting of supreme seclusion. With outstanding alfresco living areas including a pool and hot tub, superb spa facilities, and stunning interior spaces, Chalet Dalmore is one of the finest vacation rentals in the French Alps. A catered option with complimentary gourmet meals and beverages provides an especially luxurious experience of the Chamonix lifestyle.Nestled amid enchanting alpine forests, the villa's unique design combines classic chalet charm with modernist principles. Returning from a day on the mountain, enjoy evenings together in the gorgeous, open-plan living-and-dining-room, kindling a fire in the fireplace (a work of art in its own right), savoring a fine wine in the sumptuous lounge, and beholding the spectacular vistas. Then gather at the beautiful dining table for a delectable, four-course feast. At night or during downtime, gather in the excellent media lounge with cozy sofas and large television, or withdraw to the wonderful attic-level lounge, with beautiful furnishings and lovely views.Outstanding spa facilities and alfresco living areas add a superb dimension to Chalet Dalmore. Enjoy a delicious soak in the outdoor hot tub, savoring the crisp air and dreamy fragrances of the forest, and plunge into the ample swimming pool. Enjoy time in the indoor sauna, and treat yourself to a well-deserved massage.The villa's five bedroom suites all feature a queen bed (or two singles), ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub, and direct access to furnished balconies. The master suite enjoys a private balcony and an electric fireplace. With room for ten, the villa is ideal for families, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.Chalet Dalmore balances exquisite privacy with outstanding access to some of the finest skiing, golf, and dining in the French Alps. You're just one kilometer from both La Flegere cable car at Mont Blanc and the entrance to Chamonix Golf Club, and about four kilometers to the heart of Chamonix, where world-class dining and nightlife await you.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the Val D'Orcia Region, Aiola is a strikingly beautiful, restored country house that is part of a 1700-acre estate. An intimate, luxurious haven, Aiola is ideal for private getaways and family reunions. Larger groups can also rent Villa Monticchia, which is part of the same estate.This lovely villa is located in the Val d'Orcia region, south of Tuscany. This extraordinarily beautiful stretch of Italy sits between Rome and Florence with open, breathtaking views of Mount Amiata. Aiola is very close to San Casciano dei Bagni, a beautiful unspoiled medieval village that is one of the well-kept secrets of this special region.The property's ground floor features a spacious living/game room with a billiard and gambling table. There is a lovely dining area with an open kitchen corner with direct access to the garden. Also on the ground floor are a queen bedroom and twin bedroom, each with its own private bathroom.Aiola's first level provides special spaces for dining and relaxation. The reception/living hall with fireplace, living/television room and elegant dining room provide ideal gathering spaces for guests. The master suite has a queen-sized bedroom and a private bathroom with shower. Two twin bedrooms, one full bedroom and two additional bathrooms make this a wonderful place to share with friends and family.Wander outside the villa and you can revel in the carefully tended gardens and extensive lawn, ideal for lounging. Take a walk in Aiola's private woods, or as an alternative, while away an afternoon dining al fresco in the private pergola, taking breaks for a refreshing dip in Aiola's impressive and beautiful swimming pool. The nearest village, San Casciano dei Bagni, is 15 minutes away by car.Copyright © 2013 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS Aiola provides maximum comfort in a peaceful, refined and very private atmosphere. Guests can enjoy walks and bike rides through the property’s private paths, and visits to nearby Montepulciano, Montalcino, and Cetona - famous for their history, cuisine and wineries. Close by is San Casciano Dei Bagni - its old Roman Spa has recently been refurbished offering a natural hot water pool, beauty and health treatments. Among the magnificent qualities of Aiola is its cuisine, supervised by a Tuscan cook who has mastered the traditional culinary skills of the region.

listing.listing_description: Leila is a quintessential Tuscan patrician villa positioned high atop a hill on a large estate in the Chianti area. Although the villa is an ideal retreat for privacy, rest and relaxation, the city of Florence with all of its wonderful boutiques, restaurants, arts and culture is easily reached in just twenty five minutes. A stay at Leila will put you on top of the world – figuratively and literally. Perched at over 1,000 feet above sea level, with panoramic views of the surrounding forest, olive groves and vineyards, get ready for the perfect holiday in Tuscany!The outside features at Leila include a verdant park, a private heated swimming pool, a tennis court and a soccer field. All of these options add especial value for guests who love outdoor living and staying active on vacations. You will absolutely adore lounging or dining on the terrace in this wonderful atmosphere that is seamlessly integrated with the beauty of the outside world around you. Don’t forget to mount the tower and take in the 360 degree views!The villa’s interior understated elegance evokes old world charm while creating a warm and inviting atmosphere all at once. The interior features a home entertainment system and plush, largely monochromatic furnishings. The fully equipped kitchen is bright and spacious with a center island – a dream for the culinary genius in your group.Spoil yourself in any of the eight posh and supremely comfortable bedrooms. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, televisions and DVD players. You will find a variety of sleeping arrangements from king beds to queens and twins, so there is sure to be something for everyone.Leila is a perfect accommodation for family gatherings or a group of friends who may appreciate opportunities for privacy while vacationing with their entourage. This villa is a highly recommended property and early booking is advisable. While Tuscan cuisine favors simple items like bread, cheese, fresh produce and olive oil, the art from this area of the world, from the Renaissance to today, has achieved legendary status. Get the vacation you deserve this year in Italy!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled on the edge of Buseto Palizzolo, a small village 20 km from Trapani, is Ager Costa — one of our most welcoming villas in Sicily. The location is quiet but not overly isolated, with lots of sunshine, countryside views and other village houses nearby.On warm days, cool off in the beach-style private swimming pool, or lounge on one of the sun chairs. An outdoor barbecue is a great way to cook up a casual meal—once it’s ready, enjoy it in the alfresco dining area. A daily tidying service is included, and you’ll find a basket of goodies waiting upon your arrival. Guests are also welcome to pick any seasonal vegetables from the villa’s garden.Inside the villa you’ll notice touches of exposed stone and a pleasant mix of antiques and contemporary pieces throughout, and more importantly, that the furnishings are both tasteful and comfortable. The main kitchen comes fully equipped with plenty of appliances, including an 8-burner gas stove, dishwasher, microwave and two refrigerators. An upstairs kitchenette is convenient for preparing light snacks and refreshments.The villa’s eight bedrooms accommodate up to 16 guests. Each suite features an ensuite bathroom with a private shower and air conditioning, while most offer mini bar and LCD televisions. A junior suite is ideal for young families, as are bedrooms 6 and 7 which share an interconnecting door. Two bedrooms feature French beds (47 inches / 120 cm wide) which is between the sizes of a single and a double bed.There are plenty of charming towns and archeological sites to explore nearby, including the medieval old town center of Erice and the temple of Segesta. The shops and restaurants of Buesto Palizzolo are less than a 3 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Traditional charm, classic views and modern comforts make for memorable holidays at Villa Yakamoz. Part of the exclusive Porto Rafael enclave on the northeastern coast of Sardinia, this luxury vacation rental looks out over the hillside to the azure sea. Invite up to eleven friends or family members to enjoy the rustic architectural details alongside state-of-the-art entertainment areas.Villa Yakamoz opens to a gorgeous terrace facing the water, with daybeds and loungers scattered around an infinity pool. Covered sitting and dining areas are a respite from the sun, and a pizza oven and barbecue make it easy to try out local specialties. Inside, the villa is as well appointed as a resort, with amenities from a home theater and sauna to a games room with ping-pong and foosball tables.Arched doorways, stone floors, brick fireplaces and vintage wooden doors give the villa’s interiors a quaint, vintage look. But the furnishings are stylish and modern, such as the roll-arm sofas and rough-hewn coffee table in the living room, and the wicker chairs around the dining table. Beamed ceilings lend homey appeal in the fully equipped kitchen, which conveniently opens to the al-fresco dining area.Each of the five bedrooms at Villa Yakamoz has a private en-suite bathroom for your comfort. Beamed ceilings, warm neutral tones and views of the countryside make the bedrooms serene retreats where you’ll want to linger.The villa is a short walk or drive from five different beaches where you can swim in the island’s famously clear water or take a honeymoon-worthy stroll over fine golden sand. It’s a quick trip down to the Porto Rafael marina to marvel at the yachts and oceanfront views. And the Olbia area is well worth exploring, from the gorgeous Costa Smeralda and chic resort of Porto Cervo to the historic town of Olbia itself.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Steal away to a haven where the traditional and contemporary are perfectly paired, and a charming rural setting is nevertheless close to beaches, nightlife and the airport, at Finca Bonito. Though it’s set amid a lush garden outside San Lorenzo, this lovingly restored heritage property is only 15 minutes from the sights, restaurants and nightlife of Ibiza Town. Reserve this four-bedroom vacation rental for a quiet holiday with family or a sunny getaway with friends.A lot that’s nearly an acre and a half in size and beautifully landscaped with mature plantings ensures a serene, private backdrop for your stay. The grounds include a pool, an expansive terrace with lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and an open-sided Balinese-style pavilion. Other amenities range from a satellite TV and sound system to Wi-Fi.The 200-year-old residence was recently restored to a state of modern luxury, and now boasts contemporary comforts such as air conditioning and underfloor heating. But the tile-roofed, stucco-clad house is still replete with antique charm, from the carved panels and cozy fireplace in the two living rooms and dining areas to the beamed ceiling in the sleek, fully equipped kitchen.Finca Bonito has three bedrooms with king beds and terrace access, and one bedroom with two twin beds; all four have en-suite bathrooms. Clean-lined furnishings and artwork sourced from around the globe give the bedrooms a stylish yet eclectic appeal.When you arrive on Ibiza, it’s only a 25-minute drive from the airport to the villa’s location between Santa Gertrudis and San Lorenzo. Find the perfect gift (or a treat for yourself) or enjoy a honeymoon-worthy dinner at one of the popular shops and restaurants nearby. For a day of sightseeing or an unforgettable evening out, make the 15-minute drive into Ibiza Town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The glamour of the French Riviera is alive and well at the newly built Villa Colibri. From sleek finishes to colorful mod furnishings, the ’70s-inspired chic of this luxury vacation rental will make you feel like a star on a warm-weather holiday. Thanks to its setting on a hillside just outside La Croix-Valmer, the ten-bedroom property even boasts views over vineyards and the countryside to the sea.The villa’s quiet, private lot has been groomed with lush lawns, manicured gardens and whimsical sculptures. The main house is oriented to look out to the Mediterranean over a lawn dotted with lounge chairs and a heated infinity pool and hot tub. While away the day in the Riviera sunshine, then pour a glass of wine to sip in the shade of the al-fresco dining area as you heat up the barbecue for dinner. In the evenings, you can watch the stars come out from the second-floor terrace or enjoy a movie in the home theater.An inspired mix of textures and colors gives the interiors of Villa Colibri their own vibrant personality. The great room is dominated by a double-sided stone fireplace and filled with bold pieces like a mint-green velour sofa, candy-colored accent pillows, gold-framed bookcases and matching dining chairs with ocean-blue cushions. The fully equipped kitchen takes a more minimalist but equally appealing tack, with smoked glass hiding the vent hood and flat-fronted cabinetry.In addition to the main house, there are three separate apartments at Villa Colibri; all three apartments have fully equipped kitchens and all ten bedrooms have king beds. The main house has three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and two that share a bathroom, the first apartment’s two bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the second apartment’s two bedrooms share a bathroom. The third apartment, which could be used as a honeymoon suite within the property, has a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom.The closest town to Villa Colibri is La Croix-Valmer, whose shops and restaurants are just a 10-minute walk away. If you’re traveling with family, you may enjoy exploring quieter seaside towns such as Gigaro, Cavalaire-sur-Mer, Ramatuelle and Port Grimaud. Otherwise, head straight for the glitz of Saint-Tropez, 12 km away. There are six beaches within an 13 km drive of the villa, as well as a golf course just under 14 km away. At the end of your stay, plan on a 16 km drive to La Môle - Saint Tropez Airport or a 108 km drive to Nice Côte d’Azur Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Faded wooden walkways lead the way through a manicured yard and towering trees to this modern home. Completely renovated in 2015, plush, velvet-finished furniture and a caramel colour scheme add a comfortable, homey element to the space. Located on the south-west side of Ibiza, you’re only a 10-minute drive from the excitement of restaurants, beach clubs, and of course, a vibrant nightlife. Wide entryways let each room flow into the next, creating fluidity throughout. A focal point, besides the natural stone walls, is the floating staircase that winds its way up to the second floor. Woven pendant lights add rustic charm to the alfresco dining area for 12. Glass walls and windows let natural light stream in from dawn to dusk. Take a seat on the vine-covered upstairs terrace to get the best view of the dramatic sunsets.Ideal for a family holiday, the tree-lined Can Bella property features fun for everyone; take your best serve on the flood-lit tennis court, play a game of pétanque, or cool off in the unheated, circular swimming pool. The many sunbeds and loungers under the grass-roofed pergola provide refuge from the sun. In nearby Sant Josep de sa Talaia, jeep tours, parasailing adventures and snorkeling await. Pack up the car and explore the electric turquoise waters at Cala Tarida. As a special treat, at-home couple’s massages are available.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Rising out a verdant Tuscan valley, this delightful and historic castle is set in the idyllic green surroundings of the Val d'Orcia. Fully renovated, the exterior stone turns golden at sunset, with guests free to enjoy the grand rooms, gardens, vineyard, courtyard and poolside lawns. A profusion of charming villages, vineyards and nature reserves are just minutes away, with majestic Siena nearby. Visible from kilometres away, the heights of Castelnuovo Tancredi announce themselves upon the guest from a distance. Entering the welcoming and Italian-tiled foyer, guests will experience a perfect night’s sleep in the huge bedrooms that feature vaulted ceilings and canopy beds. When morning dawns, guests can take in the stunning, rolling hillsides of the protected valley from the villa’s open-air terrace, before exploring the rambling, beautifully maintained gardens, the blue pearl that is the villa’s pool, or the perfectly-maintained tennis court. The stone, ivy-lined walls of the impressive inner courtyard make for a perfect oasis of peace, with the afternoon warmth emanating around the shaded alfresco table. This villa is surrounded by a wealth of day-trip options. Guests can taste the riches of the vineyard and visit the impressive wine cellars that buttress the castle, or venture a few minutes away to the charming medieval streets of the village of Buonconvento. To the east, the forest paths and impressive viewpoints of two nature reserves make for excellent hiking and family outing options. The Renaissance-splendor of Siena is on full display less than 30 minutes to the north, with the town’s stunning central square and UNESCO-protected architecture providing a jaw-dropping example of Italy’s rich history. After a day spent exploring the riches of the countryside, return to the huge interior dining space of the castle to savor a hearty Italian meal, before taking a rich glass of Sangiovese on the moonlit terrace.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Host a special family event, a business retreat or even a romantic destination wedding in a dreamy 15th-century Catalan manor at Masia Victoria. This enchanting villa has gorgeous architectural detail and was recently renovated to add beautiful modern amenities. Two private patios, three large meeting rooms, a chapel and a location only 20 minutes from Barcelona’s El Prat airport make it easy to celebrate a birthday or anniversary, meet for a conference or hold an unforgettable ceremony.This luxury vacation rental opens to two pretty courtyards with al-fresco sitting and dining areas both sunny and shaded, a long pool, plenty of lounge chairs and a barbecue. If you’ll be holding an event, choose from a spacious conference room, two meeting rooms and a chapel for the venue. For a quiet evening in after a day of sightseeing, there’s a cozy wood-burning fireplace, satellite television and Wi-Fi, so it’s easy to share your holiday photos.Thoughtful renovations have preserved the original detail and character of this incredible estate. Arched doorways and thick wooden doors lead into an entryway lined with trompe l’oeil features and re-creations of iconic Renaissance paintings. The long living room is bright and airy, with natural-fiber area rugs anchoring several seating areas, and the formal dining room seats twenty under elegant chandeliers. There are several more intimate living and dining areas, and a fully equipped professional kitchen.Masia Victoria has thirteen bedrooms and a honeymoon suite, all with en-suite bathrooms or private access to a hall bathroom. There are twelve bedrooms with king beds, several of which can be separated into two twin beds if desired, and one bedroom with a queen bed. The honeymoon suite has a king bed and its own en-suite bathroom.The villa’s upper floors have a charming view of the Spanish countryside—think rolling hills and tranquil vineyards. But Masia Victoria is extremely convenient to the sights of Sitges, a resort town with a promenade along the Mediterranean lined with stately mansions, plenty of oceanfront restaurants, an old town full of winding streets just waiting to be explored and a beach. Active guests can drive to the nearby tennis club and golf course, while day-trippers will be keen to spend time in downtown Barcelona.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
